alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Nemaha; Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 10:46PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JOHNSON...SOUTHWESTERN NEMAHA... EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN RICHARDSON...PAWNEE AND GAGE COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1045 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Sterling to near Lewiston to 3 miles east of Diller. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Beatrice, Tecumseh, Pawnee City, Wymore, Humboldt, Adams, Sterling, Blue Springs, Odell, Table Rock, Diller, Summerfield, Filley, Barneston, Elk Creek, Burchard, Liberty, Lewiston, Virginia, and Crab Orchard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gage; Jefferson; Johnson; Nemaha; Pawnee; Richardson
